id: Germany Discusses Lifting Ban on Deporting Syrians
paragraph: November 17, 2018BERLIN—The German government said it is considering whether to allow the deportation of some Syrian asylum seekers back to their home country in the latest sign that ruling conservatives are rethinking Chancellor Angela Merkel’s pro-immigration policies. The Interior Ministry, controlled by the chancellor’s conservative bloc, said on Friday it was examining whether Syrian refugees who commit crimes or support terror organizations should be deported back to Syria.
